item.title: The shifting responses of Hegseth, Trump and others on the lethal boat strikes
item.description: The Trump administration is facing increased scrutiny about its Sept. 2 military strikes on a boat it says was smuggling drugs to the U.S.

item.title: Trump pardons Democratic Rep. Henry Cuellar
item.description: Cuellar, of Texas, was charged last year with bribery, money laundering and conspiracy. His wife, Imelda, also received a pardon from the president.
